Project Jonah: 30 pilot whales strand in Golden Bay; juvenile beaked whale stranded in New Brighton, Christchurch https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/project-jonah-30-pilot-whales-strand-in-golden-bay-juvenile-beaked-whale-stranded-in-new-brighton-christchurch/W7LOXM26DVETXKSUWDB4R43RQ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/project-jonah-30-pilot-whales-strand-in-golden-bay-juvenile-beaked-whale-stranded-in-new-brighton-christchurch/W7LOXM26DVETXKSUWDB4R43RQ4/ 30 pilots whales stranded in Golden Bay, and a beaked whale came ashore in Christchurch. Sat, 18 Jan 2025 20:58:07 +0000 A mass stranding of around 30 pilot whales near Farewell Spit last night. Photo / via Project Jonah
Police: Woman’s death in Whau Valley, Whangārei being treated as ‘unexplained’ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-womans-death-in-whau-valley-whangarei-being-treatment-as-unexplained/3XSIP36INJE6FGODQNFTK4CN7M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/police-womans-death-in-whau-valley-whangarei-being-treatment-as-unexplained/3XSIP36INJE6FGODQNFTK4CN7M/ A scene examination and post-mortem are planned following the woman's death. How surfer Ollie Dobbin bought three Ōhope businesses before the age of 24 https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/how-surfer-ollie-dobbin-bought- Three-ohope-businesses-before-the-age-of-24/M77V3OGB2JD3TC2HOZZGCCVWLY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/how-surfer-ollie-dobbin-bought- Three-ohope-businesses-before-the-age-of-24/M77V3OGB2JD3TC2HOZZGCCVWLY/ Megan WilsonHis first business was a surf school which he bought when he was still in high school. Weather: Auckland’s forecast goes downhill as showers, strong winds set to buffet city during SailGP https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-aucklands-forecast-goes-downhill-as-showers-strong-winds-set-to-buffet-city-during-sailgp/XM7J3DMPLNAYXOLNYCZ6V62DKU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/weather-aucklands-forecast-goes-downhill-as-showers-strong-winds-set-to-buffet-city-during-sailgp/XM7J3DMPLNAYXOLNYCZ6V62DKU/ Increasing cloud expected for City of Sails, along with showers, and a daily high of 24C. Editorial: What is AI good for?
